# UD Azerbaijani TueCL

Language: [Azerbaijani](/az/index.html) (code: `az`)<br/>
Family: Turkic

This treebank has been part of Universal Dependencies since the UD v2.14 release.

The following people have contributed to making this treebank part of UD: Soudabeh Eslami, Çağrı Çöltekin.

Repository: [UD_Azerbaijani-TueCL](https://github.com/UniversalDependencies/UD_Azerbaijani-TueCL)<br />
Search this treebank on-line: [PML-TQ](https://lindat.mff.cuni.cz/services/pmltq/#!/treebank/udaz_tuecl216)<br />
Download all treebanks: [UD 2.16](/#download)

License: CC BY-SA 4.0

Genre: grammar-examples

Questions, comments?
General annotation questions (either Azerbaijani-specific or cross-linguistic) can be raised in the [main UD issue tracker](https://github.com/UniversalDependencies/docs/issues).
You can report bugs in this treebank in the [treebank-specific issue tracker on Github](https://github.com/UniversalDependencies/UD_Azerbaijani-TueCL/issues).
If you want to collaborate, please contact [soudabeh&nbsp;•&nbsp;eslami&nbsp;(æt)&nbsp;student&nbsp;•&nbsp;uni-tuebingen&nbsp;•&nbsp;de, cagri&nbsp;•&nbsp;coeltekin&nbsp;(æt)&nbsp;uni-tuebingen&nbsp;•&nbsp;de].
Development of the treebank happens directly in the UD repository, so you may submit bug fixes as pull requests against the dev branch.

## Description

This is a small treebank of grammatical examples for Azerbaijani. The
treebank tries to be neutral about the particular variety (North or
South Azerbaijani, hence, uses the ISO code for the macrolanguage
(`az`).



The Azerbaijani-TueCL treebank consists of 148 sentences, which include 20 sentences from Cairo and 119 sentences provided by the [UD Turkic Group](https://github.com/ud-turkic). This treebank is a part of the UD Turkic Treebank. To account for instances of pronominal subject omission, we have added 9 additional sentences (versions) to the Cairo corpus.
It's important to note that the original grammatical sentences are in Turkish, and some constructions and translations do not exist in Azerbaijani. As a result, we have included duplicate sentences, which are as follows:
- Sentence IDs 14 and 15
- Sentence IDs 35, 36, and 37
- Sentence IDs 54 and 55
- Sentence IDs 74 and 75
- Sentence IDs 78 and 79
- Sentence IDs 80 and 81
Currently, Azerbaijani is written using three different alphabets: the Persian alphabet in the South, and the Cyrillic and Latin alphabets in the North. The current treebank only includes sentences written in the Latin script, with plans to include sentences in the Perso-Arabic alphabet in the future. Translations of all sentences into English are also available.


## Acknowledgments

We are deeply thankful to the [UD Turkic Group](https://github.com/ud-turkic) for their weekly informative meetings and discussions and for all the support we have received.

<h2>Tokenization and Word Segmentation</h2>


<ul>
<li>This corpus contains 148 sentences, 902 tokens and 912 syntactic words.</li>
</ul>

<ul>
<li>This corpus contains 186 tokens (21%) that are not followed by a space.</li>
</ul>

<ul>
<li>This corpus does not contain words with spaces.</li>
</ul>

<ul>
<li>This corpus does not contain words that contain both letters and punctuation.</li>
</ul>

<ul>
<li>This corpus contains 9 multi-word tokens. On average, one multi-word token consists of 2.11 syntactic words.</li>
<li>There are 8 types of multi-word tokens. Examples: evdəki, Denizinkinin, aşpazxananınkını, bağdakı, evdəkininki, kitabxanadakılar, pərəstarıdı, səninkindən.</li>
</ul>

<h2>Morphology</h2>

<h3>Tags</h3>

<ul>
<li>This corpus uses 15 UPOS tags out of 17 possible: <a>ADJ</a>, <a>ADP</a>, <a>ADV</a>, <a>AUX</a>, <a>CCONJ</a>, <a>DET</a>, <a>INTJ</a>, <a>NOUN</a>, <a>NUM</a>, <a>PART</a>, <a>PRON</a>, <a>PROPN</a>, <a>PUNCT</a>, <a>SCONJ</a>, <a>VERB</a></li>
<li>This corpus does not use the following tags: SYM, X</li>
</ul>

<ul>
<li>This corpus contains 1 word types tagged as particles (PART): də</li>
</ul>

<ul>
<li>This corpus contains 15 lemmas tagged as pronouns (PRON): -ki, Nəmə, belə, biz, bu, bura, harda, kim, mən, nə, o, olar, siz, sən, öz</li>
</ul>

<ul>
<li>This corpus contains 5 lemmas tagged as determiners (DET): bir, bu, heç, o, tamam</li>
</ul>

<ul>
<li>Out of the above, 2 lemmas occurred sometimes as PRON and sometimes as DET: bu, o</li>
</ul>

<ul>
<li>This corpus contains 4 lemmas tagged as auxiliaries (AUX): bil, dəyil, i, ol</li>
</ul>

<ul>
<li>Out of the above, 2 lemmas occurred sometimes as AUX and sometimes as VERB: bil, ol</li>
</ul>

<ul>
<li>There are 4 <a href="../feat/VerbForm.html">(de)verbal forms:</a></li>
</ul>

<ul>
  <li>Conv
  <ul>
    <li>VERB: alıp, açır, cıxardıp, götürüb, gələ, oxuyarakən, yetişincə, çata, getməmış, ola</li>
  </ul>
  </li>
</ul>

<ul>
  <li>Fin
  <ul>
    <li>VERB: gəlirən</li>
  </ul>
  </li>
</ul>

<ul>
  <li>Part

    <li>AUX: olanda</li>
    <li>VERB: Oxuduxlarını, yatmış, oxuyan, yazdığını, Oxuduğuzu, bilmiş, danışanda, elədigimiz, görməmiş, olmuyan</li>

  <li>Rcp

      <li>VERB: qucaxlaşdılar</li>
    </ul>
  </li>
</ul>

<ul>
  <li><a>Evident</a></li>
</ul>

<ul>
  <li>Fh
    <ul>
      <li>VERB: böyüdü, baxmaz, gəlip, qalar, rahatlaşdırır, söyür, yuxlur, çalışdı</li>
    </ul>
  </li>
</ul>

<ul>
  <li>Nfh
    <ul>
      <li>VERB: getmişdi, yatmış, eləmişimiş, etdirməliyik, getməmış, görməmiş, yatmışdı</li>
      <li>VERB-Conv: getməmış</li>
      <li>VERB-Part: yatmış, görməmiş</li>
    </ul>
  </li>
</ul>

<h3>Pronouns, Determiners, Quantifiers</h3>


<ul>
  <li><a>PronType</a></li>
</ul>

<ul>
  <li>Dem
    <ul>
      <li>DET: o, bu</li>
      <li>PRON: o, Bunun, bunu</li>
    </ul>
  </li>
</ul>

<ul>
  <li>Int
    <ul>
      <li>NUM: neçə</li>
      <li>PRON: nə, Kimin, Nəməyə, harda</li>
    </ul>
  </li>
</ul>

<ul>
  <li>Neg
    <ul>
      <li>DET: heç</li>
    </ul>
  </li>
</ul>

<ul>
  <li>Prs
    <ul>
      <li>PRON: O, Sən, mənə, Olar, Siz, mənim, onu, Mənin, Sənə, biz</li>
    </ul>
  </li>
</ul>

<ul>
  <li><a>NumType</a></li>
</ul>

<ul>
  <li>Card
    <ul>
      <li>NUM: beş, bir, ikki, üç</li>
    </ul>
  </li>
</ul>



<ul>
  <li><a>Person</a></li>
</ul>

<ul>
  <li>1
    <ul>
      <li>AUX: bilmədim</li>
      <li>PRON: mənə, mənim, Mənin, biz, bizinən</li>
      <li>VERB: elirəm, baxacaqıdıx, diyirəm, etdirməliyik, oyandırax</li>
    </ul>
  </li>
</ul>

<ul>
  <li>2
    <ul>
      <li>AUX: bilərsiz, ol</li>
      <li>PRON: Sən, Siz, Sənə, sənin</li>
      <li>VERB: Boşla, baxıran, eliriz, istəyirsiniz, verərsən, Oxuduğuzu, aç, danışma, düsünürdüz, gəlirən</li>
      <li>VERB-Fin: gəlirən</li>
      <li>VERB-Part: Oxuduğuzu</li>
    </ul>
  </li>
</ul>

<ul>
  <li>3
    <ul>
      <li>ADJ: var, yox, yoxdur, bətərdi, gözəldir, yaxçıdı, yeyindir</li>
      <li>AUX: iydi, dəyil, dəyildi, bildi, bilir, bilmir, dəyilmiş, iydı, iymiş, olacax</li>
      <li>NOUN: mohəssildir, düktürdür, evdədir, evdəyidi, kitabdır, kişvərdir, pərəstar, saatdır, Ərim</li>
      <li>PRON: O, Olar, onu, Bunun, kindən, ona, özünə</li>
      <li>VERB: verdi, aldı, oxur, düşünmürü, getdi, istəyir, olacax, söyür, yatsa, apardı</li>
      <li>VERB-Part: qaçdığı</li>
      <li>VERB-Vnoun: olmamasıdır, oxumasıydı</li>
    </ul>
  </li>
</ul>



<ul>
  <li><a>Number[psor]</a></li>
</ul>

<ul>
  <li>Plur
    <ul>
      <li>NOUN: Tüklərin, hədəflərini, təkamulları</li>
      <li>VERB-Part: elədigimiz</li>
    </ul>
  </li>
</ul>

<ul>
  <li>Sing
    <ul>
      <li>ADJ: abisi, abisini</li>
      <li>AUX-Vnoun: olduğunu</li>
      <li>NOUN: anasın, Anasının, abisi, evdə, kitabı, paytəxti, qardaşı, yadınnan, yoldaşına, ərinə</li>
      <li>PRON: kindən, ona</li>
      <li>PROPN: Denizin</li>
      <li>VERB-Part: Oxuduxlarını, yazdığını, oxuyacaxlarını, pişirdigi</li>
      <li>VERB-Vnoun: olduğunu, oxumaması, oxuması, oxumasını, oxumasıydı, yazmasına, yuxlamasını</li>
    </ul>
  </li>
</ul>

      <li>CCONJ
        <ul>
          <li>CCONJ: nə</li>
        </ul>
      </li>
    </ul>
  </li>
</ul>

<ul>
  <li><a>Person[psor]</a>
    <ul>
      <li>1
        <ul>
          <li>NOUN: babam, maşınım, Ərim</li>
          <li>VERB-Part: elədigimiz</li>
        </ul>
      </li>
      <li>2
        <ul>
          <li>PRON: kindən</li>
        </ul>
      </li>
      <li>3
        <ul>
          <li>ADJ: abisi, abisini</li>
          <li>AUX-Vnoun: olduğunu</li>
          <li>NOUN: anasın, Anasının, Tüklərin, abisi, kitabı, paytəxti, qardaşı, yadınnan, yoldaşına, ərinə</li>
          <li>PROPN: Denizin</li>
          <li>VERB-Part: Oxuduxlarını, yazdığını, oxuyacaxlarını, pişirdigi</li>
          <li>VERB-Vnoun: olduğunu, oxumaması, oxuması, oxumasını, oxumasıydı, yazmasına, yuxlamasını</li>
        </ul>
      </li>
    </ul>
  </li>
</ul>

<h2>Syntax</h2>

<h3>Auxiliary Verbs and Copula</h3>

<ul>
<li>This corpus uses 1 lemmas as copulas (<a>cop</a>). Examples: i.</li>
</ul>

<ul>
<li>This corpus uses 3 lemmas as auxiliaries (<a>aux</a>). Examples: dəyil, bil, ol.</li>
</ul>

<h3>Core Arguments, Oblique Arguments and Adjuncts</h3>

Here we consider only relations between verbs (parent) and nouns or pronouns (child).
<ul>
  <li><a>nsubj</a>
    <ul>
      <li>VERB--NOUN (1)</li>
      <li>VERB--NOUN-Nom (21)</li>
      <li>VERB--PRON-Nom (11)</li>
      <li>VERB-Conv--NOUN-Nom (2)</li>
      <li>VERB-Conv--PRON (1)</li>
      <li>VERB-Conv--PRON-Nom (1)</li>
      <li>VERB-Fin--PRON-Nom (1)</li>
      <li>VERB-Part--NOUN-Gen (1)</li>
      <li>VERB-Part--PRON-Gen (2)</li>
      <li>VERB-Vnoun--NOUN (1)</li>
      <li>VERB-Vnoun--NOUN-Gen (2)</li>
      <li>VERB-Vnoun--NOUN-Nom (1)</li>
    </ul>
  </li>
</ul>

<ul>
  <li><a>obj</a>
    <ul>
      <li>VERB--NOUN (1)</li>
      <li>VERB--NOUN-Acc (22)</li>
      <li>VERB--NOUN-Nom (14)</li>
      <li>VERB--PRON (1)</li>
      <li>VERB--PRON-Acc (2)</li>
      <li>VERB-Conv--NOUN-Acc (1)</li>
      <li>VERB-Conv--NOUN-Nom (2)</li>
      <li>VERB-Part--NOUN-Acc (3)</li>
      <li>VERB-Part--NOUN-Nom (2)</li>
      <li>VERB-Part--PRON-Acc (1)</li>
      <li>VERB-Vnoun--NOUN-Acc (1)</li>
      <li>VERB-Vnoun--NOUN-Nom (7)</li>
    </ul>
  </li>
</ul>

<ul>
  <li><a>iobj</a>
    <ul>
    </ul>
  </li>
</ul>




<h3>Relations Overview</h3>

<ul>
<li>This corpus uses 5 relation subtypes: <a>advmod:emph</a>, <a>compound:lvc</a>, <a>compound:redup</a>, <a>nmod:poss</a>, <a>nsubj:outer</a></li>
<li>The following 8 relation types are not used in this corpus at all: <a>iobj</a>, <a>expl</a>, <a>dislocated</a>, <a>clf</a>, <a>list</a>, <a>goeswith</a>, <a>reparandum</a>, <a>dep</a></li>
</ul>
